TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 针对特定的浏览器请求，自定义与此控件适配器关联的 对象的行为。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which this control adapter is associated, for specific browser requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类改编关联的控件, 以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为。 The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 可以扩展类, 进一步自定义控件的呈现。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 控件绑定到数据源, 并通过枚举其所绑定到的数据源中的项来生成其用户界面 (通常为子控件层次结构)。A control is bound to a data source and generates its user interface (or child control hierarchy, typically), by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 有关分层数据绑定控件的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on hierarchical data-bound controls, see . 控件适配器 are.NET 用于管理特定浏览器控件生命周期中的一个或多个阶段的组件。Control adapters are.NET components that manage one or more stages in the life cycle of a control for a specific browser. 扩展类可以访问控件的生命周期阶段。 Extending the class provides access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 对于适配器, 初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 在给定请求浏览器特征的情况下搜索该控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 浏览器定义文件由类用来标识客户端浏览器的特征并将适配器映射到浏览器类型。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类以呈现绑定到对象的分层控件。The following code example shows how to extend the class to render a hierarchical control that is bound to an object. 此代码示例包含四个对象:This code example contains four objects: - 从类派生的适配器。An adapter derived from the class. - 包含控件和设备特定内容的 .aspx 文件。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 用于将适配器链接到设备类型的浏览器文件。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. - 一个 XML 文件, 其中包含员工的层次结构列表。An XML file that contains a hierarchical list of employees. 此代码示例由四个代码段组成。This code example consists of four code segments. 第一个代码段演示如何扩展该类。The first code segment demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#1)] 第二个代码段演示如何声明一个要绑定到 XML 数据源的。The second code segment demonstrates how to declare a to bind to an XML data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#4)] 第三个代码段演示如何将控件链接到 Windows CE 上运行的浏览器的自定义适配器。The third code segment shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE. 最终代码段提供控件绑定到的 XML 数据。The final code segment provides the XML data that the control binds to.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 构造类的实例。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 适配器的初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 根据请求的浏览器的特征, 搜索控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到适配器后, 控件在其属性中保存对映射的适配器实例的引用。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As HierarchicalDataBoundControl

summary.span: 检索对与此 对象关联的 控件的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 与 的当前实例关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对相应的控件 (包括其属性和方法) 的访问权限。The property provides access to the corresponding control, including its properties and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性以检索强类型控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property to retrieve a strongly typed control. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]

abstract member PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit override this.PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将关联的分层数据绑定控件的数据源中的数据绑定到适配器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated hierarchical data-bound control to the adapter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联控件的指定数据源中的数据绑定到对象。 The method binds the data in the specified data source of the associated control to the object. 如果已扩展关联的控件, 则可以重写来替换关联控件的标准数据绑定功能, 或者提供附加的数据绑定功能。You can override to replace the standard data-binding functionality of the associated control or to provide additional data-binding functionality if the associated control has been extended. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以验证是否已在调用父方法之前设置了属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to verify the property has been set prior to calling the parent method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]
